option.name: originalContent
option.value:
Nikita Pogutsa
npgtsa@pm.me CV
  • 7+ years of experience
  • Unity Engine, C#
  • Unreal Engine, C++
  • AA PC/Console titles and mobile titles
  • Gameplay, UI, Tools
  • Single player and multiplayer
  • Team leading experience
  • Agile, Scrum, Kanban

Responsive Web Design

A modern, mobile-friendly website layout using HTML5, CSS3, and Bootstrap. Focused on accessibility and cross-device compatibility.

E-Commerce Platform

Developed a scalable online store with product listings, shopping cart, and secure checkout using React and Node.js.

Personal Blog Engine

Created a custom blog platform with markdown support, user authentication, and a clean, minimalist UI.

Portfolio Showcase

Designed and built a personal portfolio site to highlight projects, skills, and experience with interactive elements.

Real-Time Chat App

Implemented a chat application with WebSocket for instant messaging and user presence indicators.

Task Management Tool

Built a productivity app for creating, tracking, and organizing tasks with drag-and-drop functionality.

Weather Dashboard

Developed a dashboard that displays real-time weather data using third-party APIs and dynamic charts.

Photo Gallery Website

Created an interactive gallery with image uploads, filtering, and lightbox viewing experience.

API Integration Project

Integrated multiple external APIs to aggregate and display data in a unified, user-friendly interface.

Data Visualization Dashboard

Engineered a dashboard with interactive charts and graphs to visualize complex datasets for business insights.
